hanzi-su-wiki:
遜

Значения

Быть скромным

Мнемоника

Внуки 孫 скромны и не бегают 辶 в присутствии старших.

Варианты

逊
purpleculture_pinyin:
xùn
to abdicate; modest; yielding; unpretentious; inferior to; (slang) to suck
отречься от престола; скромный; уступчивый; неприхотливая; уступает; (сленг) сосать

heisig_chinese_memo: My parents aren't at all modest about their grandchildren, at every opportunity they take them on the road showing them off to their friends!
heisig_constituent: modest, grandchild, child, lineage, drop, thread, spiderman, road
koohiiStory1: My parents aren´t at all modest about their grandchildren, at every opportunity they take them on the road showing them off to their friends!
koohiiStory2: He wasn´t at all modest when telling us about his grandchildren - "They´re all on the road to success" he said.
kunYomi: したが.う、へりくだ.る、ゆず.る
jp_example_words: 謙遜(けんそん): humble, humility, modesty
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: On this scooter is a child who's trying to show that his lineage is humble. All of the other children are going around in fancy cars or helicopters, but this one child wants to be a humble child of the people, so he scoots on a plebeian scooter.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this child scooting to his fancy, expensive university in a little suit. Compared to the other kids, his wheels are quite humble!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This humble child is your son (そん). You don't want any child of yours flaunting his wealth and good standing in the faces of other people. You've taught them to be humble.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You even bought your son this humble scooter and you really hope they don't grow up to be a selfish, spoiled kid this way.
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 孫 (まご、ソン потомки). Не путать: 遊 (あそぶ、ユウ играть).

Ru_trainchinese: xùn: (графема) скромный, неприхотливый; быть хуже, уступать; (книжн.) отрекаться, отказываться
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the grandchild (孫) moves (辶) humbly
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A grandchild is usually in a stroller on the road which is a more modest form of transportation than a car.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "辵", " Sun " sound. The original meaning is to escape. "Er Ya. Shi Yan: "Xun, escape." Guo Pu's note: "Xun, means escape." "Shu Wen": "Xun, escape. Congruo, Sun Sheng." Examples such as "Shang Shu. "Weizi": "My family is old, inferior to the wilderness." Kong Chuan: "At home is a mess, so I want to escape out of the wilderness." "Selected Works. Yang Ziyun "Qin Meixin": "It is because of the old Confucian scholars who are very old, holding his books and being far inferior; the doctor of courtesy, rolling his tongue and not talking."

" Xin " means backing down. "Jade articles. Chubu": "Xun, retreat." Such as "Shang Shu. "Yao Dian": "In the past, in the emperor Yao, clever literary thoughts, and the world, will be inferior to his position, let Yu Shun, make "Yao Dian"." "Han Shu. "Xiandi Ji": "The emperor abdicated, and Wei Wangpi was called the emperor." Li Xian's note: "Xun, let Ye."

" Xun " means humility. "Guang Yun. Yun Yun: "Xun, Gong Ye." Such as "Xunzi. "Chen Dao": "Respect and inferior, listen to it sensitively, dare not make private decisions, dare not make private decisions." "Historical Records. "Ji Bu Luan Bu Lie Biography": "Shan Yu tasted as a book after Lu Man Lu, not inferior, Lu Queen was furious and summoned the generals to discuss it."

" Xin " also means that it is inferior or incomparable. Such as Feng Menglong of the Ming Dynasty "Awakening the World Heng Yan. Zhang Shuer's cleverly escaped Yang Sheng: "I Yang Yanhe is inferior!" Chapter 5 of Li Ruzhen's "Jing Hua Yuan" in the Qing Dynasty: "Furong has a charming and charming posture. Although it looks good on the outside, it is open to the sun, and its nature is impermanent How can you be with your friends? Even though the color of rose is a little bit inferior to that of hibiscus, but it is always open all the time, its sex is the longest, how can you not be a friend?"
humanum_short_description_en: From "辵", " Sun " sound. The original meaning is to escape.
humanum_full_description:
從「辵」，「孫」聲。本義是逃遁。《爾雅．釋言》：「遜，遯也。」郭璞注：「遜，謂逃去。」《說文》：「遜，遁也。从辵，孫聲。」例子如《尚書．微子》：「吾家耄，遜于荒。」孔傳：「在家耄亂，故欲遯出於荒野。」《文選．揚子雲〈劇秦美新〉》：「是以耆儒碩老，抱其書而遠遜；禮官博士，卷其舌而不談。」

　　「遜」表示退讓。《玉篇．辵部》：「遜，退讓。」如《尚書．堯典》：「昔在帝堯，聰明文思，光宅天下，將遜于位，讓于虞舜，作〈堯典〉。」《漢書．獻帝紀》：「皇帝遜位，魏王丕稱天子。」李賢注：「遜，讓也。」

　　「遜」表示謙虛。《廣韻．慁韻》：「遜，恭也。」如《荀子．臣道》：「恭敬而遜，聽從而敏，不敢有以私決擇也，不敢有以私取與也。」《史記．季布欒布列傳》：「單于嘗為書嫚呂后，不遜，呂后大怒，召諸將議之。」

　　「遜」還表示不及、比不上。如明代馮夢龍《醒世恒言．張淑兒巧智脫楊生》：「我楊延和到底遜人一籌！」清代李汝珍《鏡花緣》第5回：「芙蓉生成媚態嬌姿，外雖好看，奈朝開暮落，其性無常，如此之類，豈可與友，至月季之色雖稍遜芙蓉，但四時常開，其性最長，如何不是好友？」

謙遜(けんそん): humble, humility, modesty

從「 辵 」，「 孫 」聲。本義是逃遁。《爾雅．釋言》：「遜，遯也。」郭璞注：「遜，謂逃去。」《說文》：「遜，遁也。从辵，孫聲。」例子如《尚書．微子》：「吾家耄，遜于荒。」孔傳：「在家耄亂，故欲遯出於荒野。」《文選．揚子雲〈劇秦美新〉》：「是以耆儒碩老，抱其書而遠遜；禮官博士，卷其舌而不談。」 「 遜 」表示退讓。《玉篇．辵部》：「遜，退讓。」如《尚書．堯典》：「昔在帝堯，聰明文思，光宅天下，將遜于位，讓于虞舜，作〈堯典〉。」《漢書．獻帝紀》：「皇帝遜位，魏王丕稱天子。」李賢注：「遜，讓也。」 「 遜 」表示謙虛。《廣韻．慁韻》：「遜，恭也。」如《荀子．臣道》：「恭敬而遜，聽從而敏，不敢有以私決擇也，不敢有以私取與也。」《史記．季布欒布列傳》：「單于嘗為書嫚呂后，不遜，呂后大怒，召諸將議之。」 「 遜 」還表示不及、比不上。如明代馮夢龍《醒世恒言．張淑兒巧智脫楊生》：「我楊延和到底遜人一籌！」清代李汝珍《鏡花緣》第5回：「芙蓉生成媚態嬌姿，外雖好看，奈朝開暮落，其性無常，如此之類，豈可與友，至月季之色雖稍遜芙蓉，但四時常開，其性最長，如何不是好友？」

遜字的基本解释

遜
xùn
见“逊”。

遜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xùn］
［《廣韻》蘇困切，去慁，心。］
“孫2”的被通假字。亦作“愻1”。“逊1”的繁体字。
(1)逃遁；逃避。
(2)辞让；退让。
(3)谦虚；恭顺。
(4)差；比不上；不及。
(5)方言。谓窘倒对方，使其退出。

遜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　遜； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1263第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?蘇困切，音巽。【正韻】順也，謙恭也。【書·舜典】五品不遜。又【太甲】有言遜于汝志。又【說命】惟學遜志。【註】謙抑也。遜其志，如有所不能也。　又【說文】遁也。【書·微子】吾家耄遜于荒。【註】逃遁于荒野也。　通作孫。【詩·豳風】公孫碩膚。【禮·學記】孫其業也。【春秋·莊元年】夫人孫于齊。【集韻】亦作愻。

考證：〔【書·大甲】有言遜于汝心。〕　謹照原文大改太。心改志。

暂无。

xùn
вм. 逊
Radicals: 子, 系  (child, lineage, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
On this scooter is a child who's trying to show that his lineage is humble. All of the other children are going around in fancy cars or helicopters, but this one child wants to be a humble child of the people, so he scoots on a plebeian scooter.
Picture this child scooting to his fancy, expensive university in a little suit. Compared to the other kids, his wheels are quite humble!
Reading Mnemonic
This humble child is your son (そん). You don't want any child of yours flaunting his wealth and good standing in the faces of other people. You've taught them to be humble.
You even bought your son this humble scooter and you really hope they don't grow up to be a selfish, spoiled kid this way.
